item.title: Xbox Game Pass Adds Two Incredible Highly Rated Games
item.description:
Xbox Game Pass subscribers now have access to two more incredible adventures: Rise of the Tomb Raider and Little Nightmares 2. The two highly rated games provide another example of the varied selection of titles available to members of Microsoft’s subscription gaming service. With the highest tiers featuring a rotating catalog of hundreds of titles, including some that are playable on launch day, Xbox Game Pass continues to offer an enticing value proposition for many gamers.

In fact, in recent months, Xbox Game Pass has been on such an incredible hot streak that many people fear that it can only inevitably go downhill from here. The list of outstanding games added to the subscription service so far in 2025 include Sandfall Interactive’s Clair Obscur: Expedition 33, The Elder Scrolls 4: Oblivion Remastered, Blue Prince, Dredge, Balatro, and The Alters in June.

There have already been many exciting games announced to be coming to Xbox Game Pass in July, and the month is kicking off with two titles that should appeal to a variety of gamers: Little Nightmares 2 and Rise of the Tomb Raider. Happily, both of these additions originally released several years ago, meaning they are available for subscribers of all tiers except Core.

Coming to Xbox Game Pass in July 2025

Little Nightmares 2

July 1

Rise of the Tomb Raider

July 1

Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3+4

July 11

Day-one release

Wuchang: Fallen Feathers

July 24

Day-one release

Grounded 2

July 29

Day-one early access release

Crystal Dynamics’ Rise of the Tomb Raider was originally released in 2015, and it has already been part of the Xbox Game Pass catalog a couple of times in the past. It is the direct sequel to 2013’s reboot of the series and continues the adventures of Lara Croft as she heads to Siberia in search of a legendary city. The game currently has a Mighty rating on OpenCritic, with reviewers praising its stunning environments and graphics, deep characters and story, and enjoyable stealth segments.

Little Nightmares 2 is the 2021 follow-up to Tarsier Studios’ award-winning adventure game. It reacquaints players with the first title’s endearing protagonist, Six, and introduces a new character, Mono. This time, the gameplay centers around controlling the two to navigate the Pale City, a mysterious world full of dangers. With an overall Steam rating of Very Positive, Little Nightmares 2 offers something both for fans of horror and stealth.

Though the full gamut of titles planned for Xbox Game Pass in July hasn’t yet been revealed, subscribers already have a few games to look forward to, including three day-one additions. Tony Hawk’s Pro Skater 3+4 is coming on July 11 and has fans of the original games very excited. On July 24, Leenzee Games’ highly anticipated roguelike Wuchang: Fallen Feathers is launching on multiple platforms, including Xbox and Game Pass, and Obsidian’s Grounded 2 will enter early access on July 29.

item.title: Roblox: Shrimp Game Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Shrimp Game Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Shrimp Game
  • How to Get More Shrimp Game Codes

Shrimp Game is a well-made Roblox game based on the popular Squid Game series that perfectly captures the spirit and atmosphere of the show. Here, you and other players will compete for a decent amount of in-game currency by playing various mini-games identical to those in the series.

The tension will increase with each round, and to be as prepared as possible for any surprises, you need to stock up on currency, at least to buy abilities like Push or Glass Tester. Luckily, you can redeem Shrimp Game codes to get not only a bunch of currency for purchasing these skills but also other cool rewards from the developers.

Updated July 1, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Two new codes have been added, giving you the chance to collect more Credits in Shrimp Game . These can help you progress faster or unlock useful upgrades, depending on how you spend them. If you’ve already used the older ones, now’s a good time to claim something extra. More codes may be introduced later, so it’s worth checking back for updates.

All Shrimp Game Codes

Working Shrimp Game Codes

  • revamp - Enter this code to get Credits. (NEW)
  • RVMPTSR1 - Enter this code to get Credits. (NEW)
  • SHRIMP25 - Enter this code to get Credits.

Expired Shrimp Game Codes

There are currently no expired Shrimp Game codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

As in other Roblox experiences, redeeming Shrimp Game codes will greatly help you survive in these cruel games. This is thanks to the rewards you receive, you will get at least some advantage over other players, especially those who have not redeemed them. For example, the currency you receive can be profitably invested in the purchase of new skills and even roles, so don't miss this opportunity.

How to Redeem Codes for Shrimp Game

Unfortunately, Shrimp Game is currently in development and there is no code redemption option yet. However, as soon as it is added, you will be able to redeem codes and get rewards, and we in turn will add detailed instructions on how to do it here. At the moment, there is no news or information on when exactly the developers will implement this feature, but considering the high activity of the game and the community's requests, we won't have to wait long.

How to Get More Shrimp Game Codes

Finding more Shrimp Game codes is not difficult, but time-consuming, as it requires careful research on the game's official social media. There, the developers share Roblox codes from time to time, so by regularly visiting these pages, you can be one of the first to receive rewards:

  • Official Shrimp Game Roblox group.
  • Officia l Shrimp Game game page.
  • Official Shrimp Game Discord server.
  • Official Shrimp Game X account.

item.title: Roblox: Octopus Game Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Octopus Game Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes for Octopus Game
  • How to Get More Octopus Game Codes

Octopus Game is a well-made Roblox adaptation of the Netflix show Squid Game , where you can take part in survival games against other players. Just like in the show, you can win a cool prize, which is a decent amount of Cash, a game currency that you can spend on buying skins or additional game options.

Besides, you can also earn Cash by redeeming Octopus Game codes. In addition to a ton of currency, you'll also get other useful rewards, such as an Outfit Case that you can open to get a unique outfit.

Updated July 1, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A few new codes are now available, each unlocking cash and Outfit Cases to expand your collection. These bonuses can help you customize your look while stacking up in-game currency. If you’ve missed out on previous rewards, now’s a great time to catch up. Make sure to check back soon, as more offers may be added in future updates.

All Octopus Game Codes

Working Octopus Game Codes

  • GLASSBRIDGE - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case. (NEW)
  • KEYSANDKNIFES - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case. (NEW)
  • NEWFITS - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case. (NEW)
  • FREESKINS1 - Redeem this code to get Outfit Case.
  • Freemoney1 - Redeem this code to get 350,000 Cash.

Expired Octopus Game Codes

  • XD - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case.
  • REBELLIONUPDATE - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case.
  • 25MVISITS - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case.
  • HEREHAVETHECODEFOR600K - Redeem this code to get Cash and Outfit Case.
  • 500KGROUPMEMBERS - Redeem this code to get 500,000 Cash and Outfit Case.
  • SOSOSORRYFORTHEBUGS - Redeem this code to get 400,000 Cash.

Redeeming Octopus Game сodes is a great way to quickly get Cash if you can't earn it in games. So, if you are saving up for a new costume or weapon skin, or even for the opportunity to play as a security guard, so be sure to use the codes.

How to Redeem Codes for Octopus Game

Octopus Game developers took care of newcomers and made the redemption system simple and clear to fans who have played other Roblox games, so that everyone could understand how it works. We have also created a step-by-step guide on how to do it so that you don't waste any time:

  • Launch Octopus Game .
  • Pay attention to the left side of the screen. There will be two buttons. Among them, interact with the one that says Shop.
  • In the Shop menu, scroll to the bottom. Here you will find the pink redemption section.
  • In the input field, enter one of the working codes from the list above.
  • Lastly, click on the green Redeem button next to the input field to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, a notification will appear on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Octopus Game Codes

Octopus Game has a large audience, and the game developers take care of it by frequently sharing new Roblox promo codes. You can always find them both on this page as well as on the official pages of the game:

  • Official Octopus Game Roblox group.
  • Official Octopus Game Discord server.

item.title: Roblox: Squid Game X Codes (July 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All Squid Game X Codes
  • How to Redeem Squid Game X Codes
  • How to Get More Squid Game X Codes

Playing Squid Game X players will have to play various survival games. Losing means death while winning will bring you a chance to earn a lot of money. And this money can be spent not only on customization but also to buy extra life. Therefore, in this guide, we will tell you how to earn extra Coins using Squid Game X codes.

Using them you will claim various amounts of money in this Roblox survival game. Often codes reward a small amount of money, but some of them can contain up to 150 Coins.

Updated July 1, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Several new codes have just been added, offering plenty of chances to claim extra Coins. These rewards can help you progress faster and take on more challenges with ease. With so many recent additions, it’s a good time to catch up if you haven’t redeemed them in a while. Keep checking back, as more updates may bring fresh bonuses soon.

All Squid Game X Codes

Working Squid Game X Codes

  • PERFECTRUN - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • QUICKWIN - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • ONECHANCE - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • PROPLAYER - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • 350K_LIKES - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • STACKED - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • NEVERLOSE - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • FASTPASS - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • 400K_LIKES - Redeem this code to get Coins (NEW)
  • WINNERSPOT - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • RISKYPLAY - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • RAININGCASH - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • REWARDTIME - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • DAILYBOOST - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • WINBIG - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • $250K$ - Redeem this code to get 50 Coins
  • UPDATE11RELEASE - Redeem this code to get 75 Coins
  • FRONTMAN - Redeem this code to get 75 Coins
  • 150KLIKES - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • PENTA - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • MINGLE - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • REVAMP - Redeem this code to get Coins
  • $100K$ - Redeem this code to get 100 Coins

Expired Squid Game X Codes

  • +80KLIKES+
  • $100M$
  • *100KLIKES*
  • UPDATE7RELEASE
  • BAXTRIX_2
  • 50KLIKES
  • ^100MIL^
  • 75MIL
  • 20KCONC
  • 35KLIKES
  • UPDATE4RELEASE
  • GUARDS
  • 28KLIKES
  • UPDATE3RELEASE
  • REFUND
  • UPDATE5RELEASE
  • 10MIL

Each challenge in Squid Game X has different rules. In addition to the fact that losing players always die. Therefore, winning the game is quite difficult, especially for beginners. To make your life easier, you can purchase boosters, including an extra life. And although you don’t need to spend Robux to do this, it still costs a lot of coins. But by using Squid Game X codes, you can earn money quickly.

All of these codes reward players with Coins, so you can buy boosters even before your first game. However, they are valid for a limited time. So you should hurry to use them.

How to Redeem Squid Game X Codes

To use Squid Game X codes, you just need to make a few clicks. Luckily, the redemption option here is no different from other Roblox experiences:

  • First, launch Squid Game X .
  • While in the lobby, click on the button with the Twitter icon on the left side of the screen.
  • Then, paste one of the codes and press Enter on your keyboard to claim the reward.

How to Get More Squid Game X Codes

If you don't want to miss out on new Squid Game X codes, you should start following the developers' social media. There they post all the news about this Roblox game, so you will receive codes first-hand.

  • Redifi Discord server
  • redifi Roblox group

item.title: This Call of Duty Game Is Giving Away Double COD Points for a Limited Time
item.description:
Call of Duty fans will have the chance to earn double the amount of COD Points in Call of Duty Mobile from July 2 until August 10, as Activision announces a brand-new Double COD Points event. Any Call of Duty Mobile player who purchases select COD Points from the in-game store during the event will receive double the number of Points purchased. The in-game currency can then be spent on a variety of different cosmetic items or seasonal Battle Passes.

While Call of Duty Mobile remains a hugely popular option for those looking to get their first-person shooter fix on the go, the same sadly cannot be said for Call of Duty: Warzone 's mobile counterpart, Warzone Mobile . After finally launching for iOS and Android devices in March 2024, Warzone Mobile was aiming to be another popular mobile version of the iconic series. However, after just 14 months on the market, Activision announced it would be discontinuing support for Warzone Mobile . The game won't be receiving any new content updates in the future, and anyone who hasn't already downloaded and installed the shooter on their mobile devices will no longer be able to play. But those who do have Warzone Mobile installed can still jump into online matches for the foreseeable future.

Thankfully, Call of Duty Mobile remains a popular choice for mobile gamers, and Activision is giving fans even more of a reason to jump into the shooter this month as it has now revealed a brand-new Double COD Points event. The event will take place between July 2 and August 10. During this time, players who purchase select COD Points will be granted double the amount. Unfortunately, as Call of Duty Mobile is a separate entity to the likes of Call of Duty: Warzone and Call of Duty: Black Ops 6 , COD Points cannot be transferred between titles. So, for any fans thinking of purchasing COD Points in Call of Duty Mobile to then use in one of the franchise's mainline titles, this isn't possible.

Call of Duty Mobile Hosting New Double COD Points Event

The upcoming event will also launch alongside Call of Duty Mobile 's Season 6 update, which will see the debut of a highly anticipated Gundam collaboration. The crossover will see brand-new cosmetic items, weapons, and a limited-time 4v4 Team Deathmatch mode. However, unlike the standard Team Deathmatch mode, players will be able to instantly deploy as a Gundam -themed operator, including Ethan (Freedom Gundam), Reaper (Sazabi Gundam), Proton (v Gundamo), and Deathscythe Gundam (EW). Each operator will also have its own unique ability for players to make use of in-game.

As for fans of Black Ops 6 and Warzone , Call of Duty will soon be launching its Season 4 Reloaded update. The mid-season patch will see plenty of new content added to both titles, including the return of Fringe, an iconic Multiplayer map from Black Ops 3 , Ranked Play Resurgence in Warzone , plenty of new cosmetic items, and more. Players will also be able to jump into a brand-new CODtoons-themed event, with iconic characters such as Beavis and Butthead coming to the game as playable operators.
